target.name: build.update.jar
target.description: Build the plug-in: org.cubictest.exporters.selenium for an update site.

target.name: build.jars
target.description: Compile classes and build nested jars for the plug-in: org.cubictest.exporters.selenium.

target.name: clean
target.description: Clean the plug-in: org.cubictest.exporters.selenium of all the zips, jars and logs created.

target.name: zip.plugin
target.description: Create a zip containing all the elements for the plug-in: org.cubictest.exporters.selenium.
